example_sentence: Zelensky gave a positive assessment of his conversation with the US envoys.
The conversation lasted nearly an hour and produced new ideas.
The talks yielded "new ideas in terms of formats, meetings, and timing."
They discussed different formats for future peace negotiations.
A follow‑up meeting is planned with the American team.
Timing on how to bring a real peace closer was a key topic.
Both sides are looking for a lasting peace in the region.
Zelensky described an updated 20‑point peace plan.
US envoy Steve Witkoff took part in the discussions.
It was an active day for Ukraine’s diplomacy.
There is still work to be done on sensitive issues.
The plan includes security guarantees from the US and NATO.
Ukraine seeks iron‑clad security guarantees in any settlement.
A demilitarised zone could be created in the east.
The Donetsk region is an industrial area of Ukraine.
Moscow controls about 75% of the Donetsk region.
A free economic zone is a potential option for the east.
The plan offers the potential withdrawal of Ukrainian troops.
Russia currently controls most of Donbas.
Zelensky is under pressure from Trump to cede territory.
Ukraine has rejected any territorial concessions so far.
Kyiv demands iron‑clad security guarantees.
Putin warned that Ukrainian troops must leave Donbas.
Umerov will continue discussions with the American team.
Ukrainian forces struck a key oil refinery in Rostov.
The Novoshakhtinsk refinery supplies fuel for Russian operations.
The refinery is critical for Russian military logistics.
The plant supplies fuel to troops stationed in occupied territories.
Russian forces took control of the settlement of Sviato‑Pokrovske.
